Training is currently unsupported due to: Training is currently unsupported due to the absence of a GPU. To activate the training tab, navigate to the settings tab and enable the 'Fake GPU' option.
Enable formant shifting. Used for male t: Enable formant shifting. Used for male to female and vice-versa convertions.

Split the audio into chunks for inferenc: Split the audio into chunks for inference to obtain better results in some cases.
Upscale the audio to a higher quality, r: Upscale the audio to a higher quality, recommended for low-quality audios. (It could take longer to process the audio)
A simple, high-quality voice conversion: A simple, high-quality voice conversion tool focused on ease of use and performance.

Denotes the duration it takes for the sy: Denotes the duration it takes for the system to transition to a significant pitch change. Smaller hop lengths require more time for inference but tend to yield higher pitch accuracy.

The number of CPU cores to use in the ex: The number of CPU cores to use in the extraction process. The default setting are your cpu cores, which is recommended for most cases.
Specify the number of GPUs you wish to u: Specify the number of GPUs you wish to utilize for preprocess by entering them separated by hyphens (-). At the moment, using multi-gpu will not have a significant effect.
Set the room size of the reverb.
The f0 curve represents the variations i: The f0 curve represents the variations in the base frequency of a voice over time, showing how pitch rises and falls.
The number of CPU cores to use in the pr: The number of CPU cores to use in the preprocess. The default setting are your cpu cores, which is recommended for most cases.

By employing pitch guidance, it becomes: By employing pitch guidance, it becomes feasible to mirror the intonation of the original voice, including its pitch. This feature is particularly valuable for singing and other scenarios where preserving the original melody or pitch pattern is essential.
Force the use of CPU for training.
Drag your plugin.zip to install it: Drag your plugin.zip to install it
Utilize pretrained models when training: Utilize pretrained models when training your own. This approach reduces training duration and enhances overall quality.
We prioritize running the model extracti: We prioritize running the model extraction on the GPU for faster performance. If you prefer to use the CPU, simply leave the GPU field blank.
Move files to custom embedder folder: Move files to custom embedder folder
The information to be placed in the mode: The information to be placed in the model (You can leave it blank or put anything).

The GPU information will be displayed he: The GPU information will be displayed here.
Set the autotune strength - the more you: Set the autotune strength - the more you increase it the more it will snap to the chromatic grid.
We prioritize running the model preproce: We prioritize running the model preprocessing on the GPU for faster performance. If you prefer to use the CPU, simply leave the GPU field blank.
KMeans is a clustering algorithm that di: KMeans is a clustering algorithm that divides the dataset into K clusters. This setting is particularly useful for large datasets.
Detect overtraining to prevent the model: Detect overtraining to prevent the model from learning the training data too well and losing the ability to generalize to new data.
Click the refresh button to see the pret: Click the refresh button to see the pretrained file in the dropdown menu.
Sets advanced GPU settings, recommended: Sets advanced GPU settings, recommended for users with better GPU architecture.

Select the precision you want to use for: Select the precision you want to use for training and inference.
Cache the dataset in GPU memory to speed: Cache the dataset in GPU memory to speed up the training process.
Post-process the audio to apply effects: Post-process the audio to apply effects to the output.
Check which version of Applio is the lat: Check which version of Applio is the latest to see if you need to update.

Adjusting the position more towards one: Adjusting the position more towards one side or the other will make the model more similar to the first or second.

Select two voice models, set your desire: Select two voice models, set your desired blend percentage, and blend them into an entirely new voice.

The path where the output audio will be: The path where the output audio will be saved, by default in assets/audios/output.wav
Select the voice model to use for the co: Select the voice model to use for the conversion.
The button 'Upload' is only for google c: The button 'Upload' is only for google colab: Uploads the exported files to the ApplioExported folder in your Google Drive.
Enable this setting only if you are trai: Enable this setting only if you are training a new model from scratch or restarting the training. Deletes all previously generated weights and tensorboard logs.

Set the maximum number of epochs you wan: Set the maximum number of epochs you want your model to stop training if no improvement is detected.
Set the dry gain of the reverb.
Set the damping of the reverb.
Set the freeze mode of the reverb.
Apply pitch shift to the audio.

Enabling this setting will result in the: Enabling this setting will result in the G and D files saving only their most recent versions, effectively conserving storage space.
Set the chorus center delay ms.
Utilizing custom pretrained models can l: Utilizing custom pretrained models can lead to superior results, as selecting the most suitable pretrained models tailored to the specific use case can significantly enhance performance.
Specifies the overall quantity of epochs: Specifies the overall quantity of epochs for the model training process.
The file you dropped is not a valid pret: The file you dropped is not a valid pretrained file. Please try again.
It's advisable to align it with the avai: It's advisable to align it with the available VRAM of your GPU. A setting of 4 offers improved accuracy but slower processing, while 8 provides faster and standard results.
This setting enables you to save the wei: This setting enables you to save the weights of the model at the conclusion of each epoch.
Determine at how many epochs the model w: Determine at how many epochs the model will saved at.
Influence exerted by the index file; a h: Influence exerted by the index file; a higher value corresponds to greater influence. However, opting for lower values can help mitigate artifacts present in the audio.
Pitch extraction algorithm to use for th: Pitch extraction algorithm to use for the audio conversion. The default algorithm is rmvpe, which is recommended for most cases.
If the number is greater than or equal t: If the number is greater than or equal to three, employing median filtering on the collected tone results has the potential to decrease respiration.
Substitute or blend with the volume enve: Substitute or blend with the volume envelope of the output. The closer the ratio is to 1, the more the output envelope is employed.
Safeguard distinct consonants and breath: Safeguard distinct consonants and breathing sounds to prevent electro-acoustic tearing and other artifacts. Pulling the parameter to its maximum value of 0.5 offers comprehensive protection. However, reducing this value might decrease the extent of protection while potentially mitigating the indexing effect.
Set the pitch of the audio, the higher t: Set the pitch of the audio, the higher the value, the higher the pitch.
